indicators.name: COMPLIANCE WITH THE BARANGAY FULL DISCLOSURE POLICY (BFDP) BOARD
indicators.description: Barangay compliance with transparency and disclosure requirements
indicators.minimum_requirement_html:
Posted the following CY 2023 financial documents in the BFDP board, pursuant to DILG MC No. 2014-81 and DILG MC No. 2022-027:

  • a) Barangay Financial Report
  • b) Barangay Budget
  • c) Summary of Income and Expenditures
  • d) 20% COUtilization
  • e) Annual Procurement Plan or Procurenoment of the NTA merit List
  • f) List of Notices of Award (1st - 3rd Quarter of CY 2023)
  • g) Itemized Monthly Collections and Disbursements (January to September 2023)
indicators.technical_notes_text: Verify physical posting of all required documents. Documents must be visible and accessible to the public.

indicators.name: ALLOCATION FOR STATUTORY PROGRAMS AND PROJECTS AS MANDATED BY LAWS AND/OR OTHER ISSUANCES
indicators.description: Barangay allocates funds for mandated programs
indicators.minimum_requirement_html:
With allocated funds for the following statutory programs and projects:

  • a) At least 20% of the NTA is allocated for development programs;
  • b) Not less than five percent (5%) shall be set aside as the Local Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Fund;
  • c) Gender and Development;
  • d) Senior Citizens and Persons with Disabilities;
  • e) Implementation of the programs of the Local Councils for the Protection of Children; and
  • f) Ten percent (10%) for the Sangguniang Kabataan
indicators.technical_notes_text: Verify budget allocations meet all statutory requirements.

fields.label: Means of Verification (MOV)
fields.description: Approved Barangay Appropriation Ordinance; Annual Investment Program signed by Barangay Treasurer, Barangay Secretary, and Punong Barangay; and Certification for the Allocation for Statutory Programs and Projects signed by the City/Municipal Budget Officer

rules.condition: (dev_programs_allocation / nta_total) >= 0.20 && (drrm_allocation / nta_total) >= 0.05 && (sk_allocation / nta_total) >= 0.10 && gad_allocation > 0 && senior_pwd_allocation > 0 && children_allocation > 0

indicators.technical_notes_text: All 6 allocations must meet minimum thresholds: 20% dev programs, 5% DRRM, 10% SK, plus allocations for GAD, Senior/PWD, and Children.
